definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: The commission concluded that Oswald acted alone.
sentences.chinese: 委员会推断出奥维德单独行动。

sentences.english: He tried to guess how the strata behaved at the time the contortions formed .
sentences.chinese: 他试图推断地层在扭曲形成时是如何变化的。

sentences.english: That calculation gives China enormous bargaining power.
sentences.chinese: 这种推断让中国有了巨大的议价能力。

sentences.english: So, it is undesirable by using the situation of podding quantity per plant for inferring the stand yield.
sentences.chinese: 不能用单株的结荚鼓粒状况去推断群体产量。

sentences.english: The production of deducing the inducement has been reduced after a newer introduction.
sentences.chinese: 在一个更新的引言之后推断诱因的结果已经减少。

sentences.english: Inference provides some of the answers.
sentences.chinese: 部分问题可通过推断得到答案。

sentences.english: I learned a lot about how to compare personal experiences and deduce their relativity.
sentences.chinese: 我认识到该如何对比个人经历并推断出它们的相关性。

sentences.english: It is a correct argument that Huayingshan fault zone is a fundamental fault.
sentences.chinese: 推断华蓥山断裂带系基底断裂的论点是正确的。

sentences.english: Well, you can kind of infer.
Yet there is something too deterministic about Mr Jacques's economic and political extrapolations .
sentences.chinese: 然而雅克的经济和政治推断也有一些显得太绝对化了。

sentences.english: They have to deduce from the shape of each bone what the muscles were like.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须从每块骨头的形状来推断其肌肉是什么样的。

sentences.english: From the postmark he inferred where she lived .
sentences.chinese: 他从邮戳推断他住在什么哪里？

sentences.english: From the facts, we deduced that the Empire was decaying.
sentences.chinese: 从这些事实我们推断这个帝国正在衰退。

sentences.english: Based on these findings, Keller suspects that each person has an olfactory blind spot.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些发现，凯勒推断，每个人都有一个嗅觉盲区。

sentences.english: Therefore it is inferred that the fragment was from the W chromosome of Bombyx.
sentences.chinese: 从而初步推断该分子标记来自于家蚕的W染色体。

sentences.english: We surmised by the clothes she was wearing that she was a chef.
sentences.chinese: 我们由她的穿着推断她是主厨。

definition: to conclude/to determine/to come to a judgment
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
